section.name: Transit Command Line
section.source:
$ transit help Usage: transit [-profile <url> info|add|set|remove|help] command -profile <url> Configuration profile. info|add|set|remove|help info List configuration. add host handler layout host <id> Add a new resource host. -url -username -password -priority -index -disabled -layout -scheme -prompt
-url <url> Host URL (required). -username <username> Username. -password <password> Password. -priority <int> Host priority. -index <resource> Host index path. -disabled Disable the host. -layout <id> Host layout strategy. -scheme <scheme> Host authentication scheme. -prompt <prompt> Host authentication prompt. handler <type> Add a new content handler. -uri -title -uri <uri> Codebase URI (required). -title <name> Title. layout <id> Add a new layout. -uri -title -uri <uri> Codebase URI (required). -title <name> Title. set Set an configuration aspect. proxy host handler layout proxy Select proxy settings. -url -username -password -excludes -url <url> Host URL. -username <username> Username. -password <password> Password. -excludes <host> [<host> ...] Proxy excludes. host <id> Resource host selection. -url -username -password -priority -index -enabled -disabled -layout -scheme -prompt
-url <url> Host URL. -username <username> Username. -password <password> Password. -priority <int> Host priority. -index <resource> Host index path. -enabled -disabled -enabled Enable the host. -disabled Disable the host. -layout <id> Host layout strategy. -scheme <scheme> Host authentication scheme. -prompt <prompt> Host authentication prompt. handler <type> Content handler selection. -uri -title -uri <uri> Codebase URI. -title <name> Title. layout <id> Layout scheme selection. -uri -title -uri <uri> Codebase URI. -title <name> Title. remove host handler layout proxy host <id> Resource host selection. handler <type> Content handler selection. layout <id> Layout scheme selection. proxy Delete proxy settings. help Print command help.

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Provides supporting listing of the Transit configuration and commands enabling the addition removal and modification of hosts, layouts and content handlers.
